hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) gave the people news of death of Negus on the day on which he died, took them out to the place of prayer, drew them up in rows and said: "Allah is Most Great" four times

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى الْمُسْلِمِ يَمُوتُ فِي بِلاَدِ الشِّرْكِ
chapter.eng-name: Performing The Funeral Prayer For A Muslim Who Dies In The Land Of Shirk
